summary: The document is an identification form related to the JFK assassination system, detailing an interview with Epifanio Romero-Delgado conducted on January 21, 1963. It includes information about Romero-Delgado's arrest in Cuba, his employment, and his statements regarding his detention and interrogation by Cuban authorities. The document is marked as unclassified and was released with deletions on March 7, 1995.
key_findings: Epifanio Romero-Delgado was interviewed in connection with the JFK assassination system.
He was arrested in Cuba on suspicion of anti-Castro activities and detained without food or water.
Romero-Delgado claimed this was his only arrest and denied any other detentions for civil, political, or military reasons.
The document was reviewed and released with deletions in 1995.
